```{css, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
body {
  counter-reset: counter-rchunks;
}

div.main-container {
  padding-left: 5em;
}

pre.r {
  counter-increment: counter-rchunks;
  position: relative;
  overflow: visible;
}

pre.r::before {
  content: 'In [' counter(counter-rchunks) ']: ';
  display: inline-block;
  position: absolute;
  left: -5em;
  color: rgb(48, 63, 159);
}
```
